title: How to Make a Turtle Crunch Cake

steps.headline: Let your chocolate cake cool for about an hour if you just cooked it.
Poke holes all over the cake using something pointy, like a toothpick.
Use a bottle opener to poke a hole in the can of condensed milk.
Pour the milk evenly over the cake and let it soak in before doing anything else.
Heat up the hot fudge and caramel in the microwave.
Pour both, the hot fudge and caramel, one at a time, evenly over the cake.
Spread the cool whip evenly over the cake creating a thin layer.
Chop up the heath bar into fine pieces.
Sprinkle the heath bar evenly over the cake.
Put the cake in the fridge overnight to let it set before serving it.

text: Let your chocolate cake cool for about an hour if you just cooked it.  Poke holes all over the cake using something pointy, like a toothpick.  Use a bottle opener to poke a hole in the can of condensed milk.  Pour the milk evenly over the cake and let it soak in before doing anything else.  Heat up the hot fudge and caramel in the microwave.  Pour both, the hot fudge and caramel, one at a time, evenly over the cake.  Spread the cool whip evenly over the cake creating a thin layer.  Chop up the heath bar into fine pieces.  Sprinkle the heath bar evenly over the cake.  Put the cake in the fridge overnight to let it set before serving it.
